channel.title: Web on Spyros Kyriazos
channel.description: Recent content in Web on Spyros Kyriazos

item.title: The Greek Philosopher App
item.description:
The Greek Philosopher app gathers more than six hundred of the best words of wisdom from the major schools of Greek thought. Based on original sources, this work is a compilation of carefully selected quotes spanning from the 6th Century BC to 1st Century AD. It offers guidance and motivation for a life well lived.

Available here.

item.title: Public Sector
item.description:
A list of projects I worked on during my jobs at Altec Integration and the Hellenic Army

  • Agri-environment measures system for the Greek Ministry of Agriculture
  • Digital services for the Greek Ministry of Agriculture
  • Prescription liquidation application for the Electronic Governance of Social Insurance (IDIKA)
  • Custom questionnaires creation and distribution system for the Hellenic Statistical Authority
  • System for collecting and presenting statistical data for the Greek Ministry of Justice
  • Route management and delays system for the Greek Railways
  • Services for electronic submission and processing of asset declarations
  • Administration system for the Institute of Labour of the Greek General Confederation of Labour (INE-GSEE)
  • Various administration and operation systems for the Hellenic Army
  • Data migration in Multilateral Interoperability Programme related databases for the Hellenic Army
  • Database monitoring and administration during the Greek military exercise Parmenion

item.title: Car VS Bus
item.description:
Car vs Bus is a web app that calculates the cost of fuel for your everyday commute and compares it to the cost of public transport.

Available here (In Greek).
